text: Ary Ribeiro Valadão (14 November 1918 - 9 August 2021) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was born in Anicuns, Brazil. He was a member of the National Democratic Union Party and National Renewal Alliance. Valadão was a member of the Legislative Assembly of Goiás from 1959 until 1967. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1967 until 1979 and from 1989 until 1991. He was Governor of Goiás from 1979 until 1983. Valadão turned 100 in November 2018. He died on 9 August 2021 in Goiânia, Brazil at the age of 102.Ex-governador de Goiás Ary Valadão morre aos 102 anos em Goiânia ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian centenarians Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Goiás
title: Ary Ribeiro Valadão
